resources:
Quest Hidden Settings Toolbox for Oculus Quest devices
Set Brightness to Minimum Sets the screen brightness slightly lower than the slider allows
Open Advanced Guardian Settings Allows for multiple desks and couches, as well as walls
System Wide Adblock/DNS Choose from a list of private DNS servers
Blue Light Filter Settings Set blue light filter to run on a schedule
Date and Time Settings Disable network time to change freely
App Settings View and manage installed apps and data
Extra Accessibility Audio balance and text style
Device Info View device info and set device name /* Developer Settings Access the developer settings or unlock the bootloader */
